columns.name: The name of the reviewer providing feedback.
columns.rID: The unique identifier for each reviewer.

Reviewer.table_description: The table stores information about individuals reviewing movies.

columns.rID: The unique identifier for each reviewer submitting a rating.
columns.mID: The unique identifier for each movie being rated.
columns.stars: The score given to the movie, ranging from 2 to 5 stars.
columns.ratingDate: The date when the rating was submitted.

Rating.table_description: The table records ratings assigned by reviewers to movies.

columns.mID: The unique identifier for each movie.
columns.title: The title of the movie.
columns.year: The release year of the movie.
columns.director: The name of the movie's director.

Movie.table_description: The table stores details about various movies.
